result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Harboring/Aiding a Felon (E/F/G/H/I or unclassified felony/not life)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Amber N. Anderson

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
9:29 AM Defendant Amber N. Anderson in court.  Attorney Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Court inquires on atty.
Deft heard - qualifies for Public Defender, but has not been appointed an atty yet.
Atty Reabe is present and is heard - will represent.
DA provides copy of complaint.
9:31 off record.
9:40 back on record.
Atty Reabe heard.
Deft understands charges and penalties.
Waives formal reading.
Requests prelim.
Deft waives time limits.
Court schedules.
9:41 AM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Arraignment scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Report from Public Defender re no appointment

11:28 AM Defendant Amber N. Anderson appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Atty Brad Hansen is present from PD's office for bond purposes only.
Copy of Criminal Complaint.
Court reviews charges and maximum penalties.
Deft understands.
Court inquires on Atty.
ADA heard on bond recommendations.
Atty Hansen heard on bond.
Deft heard.
Court imposes $500 cash bail w/ conditions; sign waiver of extradition, no possession or consumption of alcohol or controlled substances w/o a valid Rx, no contact by any means with A.S.
Deft to contact the Public Defender's office today.
Court schedules with parties.
11:32 AM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.
